Movements

Endpoint: /api/movements/

Methods: POST

Model Fields

  • movement_type (choices: in, out, transfer, adjustment)
  • product_id (Product ID)
  • from_location_id (Location ID, optional)
  • to_location_id (Location ID, optional)
  • quantity (decimal)
  • reason (string)

Example Request (POST)

{
    "movement_type": "in",
    "product_id": 1,
    "to_location_id": 2,
    "quantity": "100",
    "reason": "Compra"
}
